desc:
New
script-based links for using items are now ajaxed
more spoilers in Hidden City, Wormwood, and other places
rat-cellar links are laid out more visually
added spoilers for New Palindome

Fixed:
Some Council links wouldn't show in AoSP
correctly detect friendly vs. hostile knoll
work better with unified crafting interface (no separate innabox/plunger pages)
